text: I don't know many women who can relate to Sharon Stone and the kind of movies she does. I don't know a lot of guys who can relate to Tom Cruise's movies because they're on a kind of fantastic level.
author: Kim Cattrall

text: There are some movies that I would like to forget, for the rest of my life. But even those movies teach me things.
author: Antonio Banderas

text: I feel like a lot of the female relationships I see on TV or in movies are in some way free of the kind of jealousy and anxiety and posturing that has been such a huge part of my female friendships, which I hope lessens a little bit with age.
author: Lena Dunham

text: I spent all my time on my movies worried that people were eating and that the schedule was being kept, so to have experts in those areas giving me the brain space as a writer and director is huge.
author: Lena Dunham

text: Movies are movies, and I don't think any of them are going to hurt the moral fiber of America and all that nonsense.
author: Richard Pryor
